function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate isolation space for COVID-19 patients within the house","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the infectious disease to other family members","Mitigation":"Creating a well-equipped and ventilated isolation room with attached washroom facilities","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, ventilation systems","People":"Family members living in the same house","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, and interior designers"},{"Description":"Lack of open relaxation spaces within the built form of houses","Impact":"Impact on physical and mental health, increased need for social interactions while maintaining social distances","Mitigation":"Designing and modifying built forms to include open relaxation spaces, green spaces, verandahs, and rooftop access","Technologies":"Indoor plants, natural lighting, ventilation systems","People":"Inhabitants of houses or apartments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and interior designers"},{"Description":"Hygiene issues related to the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infectious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular cleaning and disinfection of shared spaces, and promoting good hygiene practices","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, antimicrobial surfaces, UV disinfection systems","People":"Inhabitants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers, and occupants"}]}
